data.description: A team member with this permission is the owner of the Club. They have full permissions, including adding or removing administrators. There can only be 1 owner in a Club at any given time.
A team member with this permission is an adminstrator of the Club. They have full permissions.
A team member with this permission can read branding information about the Club, such as it's name and logo. This permission is given to all users and cannot be disabled, as branding data is public.
A team member with this permission can update branding information (such as the Club name/logo) within the Club.
A team member with this permission can read content (such as videos) within the Club, including playing that content.
A team member with this permission can update content (such as videos) within the Club. This permission requires "content".
A team member with this permission can upload content (such as videos) within the Club. This permission requires "content" and "content_update".
A team member with this permission can read collections within the Club.
A team member with this permission can update collections within the Club. This permission requires "collection".
A team member with this permission can read catalogs within the Club.
A team member with this permission can update catalogs within the Club. This permission requires "catalog".
A team member with this permission can read Custom Content Stores within the Club.
A team member with this permission can update Custom Content Store within the Club. This permission requires "customcontentstore_update".
A team member with this permission can read Login Methods within the Club.
A team member with this permission can update Login Methods within the Club. This permission requires "login_methods_update".
A team member with this permission can read Club Payment Methods within the Club. This is different from user payment methods, and involves things like setting up Stripe integration.

A team member with this permission can update Club Payment Methods within the Club. This is different from user payment methods, and involves things like setting up Stripe integration. This permission requires "payment_methods".
A team member with this permission can read Plans and Addons within the Club.
A team member with this permission can update Plans and Addons within the Club. This permission requires "plans_and_addons".
A team member with this permission can view profile picture candidates within the Club.
A team member with this permission can update profile picture candidates within the Club. This permission requires "profile_pictures".
A team member with this permission can view tags within the Club.
A team member with this permission can update tags within the Club. This permission requires "tags".

A team member with this permission can view User Account Information for all users within the Club. This includes the ability to view information of a User Account, such as it's email, first name, last name, etc. You should be careful who you give this permission to and follow relevant user privacy laws.

A team member with this permission can update User Account Information for all users within the Club. This includes the ability to see the email, first name, last name, etc, of a User Account. You should be careful who you give this permission to and follow relevant user privacy laws. This permission requires "user_accounts".

data.ui_alias: View payment methods for user accounts
data.description: A team member with this permission can view User Account Payment Information for all users within the Club. You should be extremely careful who you give this permission to and follow relevant user privacy laws. This permission requires "user_accounts".

A team member with this permission can update User Account Payment Information for all users within the Club. You should be extremely careful who you give this permission to and follow relevant user privacy laws. This permission requires "user_accounts", "user_accounts_update", "user_accounts_payment_methods".
A team member with this permission can view a list of all other Team Members within the Club.

A team member with this permission can update other Team Members within the Club, including adding or removing members, and giving or revoking their permissions (provided that team member has the permissions they are managing. For example, a user who deosn't have administrator cannot just make another user an administrator for obvious security reasons). This permission requires "team_members".

A team member with this permission can view Billing Information for this Club. You should give this permission to your financial team. Please note, this permission allows a team member to pay invoices via Stripe and "my_billing_update" permission is not required to pay invoices.
A team member with this permission can update Billing Information for this Club. You should give this permission to your financial team. This permission requires "my_billing".
A team member with this permission can view analytics for this Club.
